document_name: Decree 35549 establishing the High Level Negotiating Team for Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CRI/2009/CRI-2009-10-23-Decree 35549 establishing the High Level Negotiating Team for Climate Change_aa42a7a23b1b535516ebddd1096091f1.pdf
document_description: This Decree creates the High Level Negotiating Team for Climate Change, of a permanent nature. The Team is responsible for preparing national position documents in accordance with the negotiation priorities of the country regarding Climate Change. Its main funtion is to participate and represent the country in meetings, conferences and events on Climate Change, both locally and those organized abroad.
